subServices.content: In software engineering, continuous integration is a development practice or a process of automating the build and testing of code. Every time a member of a development team commits changes to version control. CI supports developers to share their code and unit tests by their changes into a common version control repository after every small task completion. Committing code activates an automated build system to the up-to-date code from the common repository and to build, test, and validate the full master branch.

bullet.title: To attain Continuous Integration and Delivery we are using the below strategy
lists: Opseazy   deliver the projects as planned without any delinquent, as we are strictly follow and sturdily believe in CI/CID procedure.
We committing code activate an automated build system to the up-to-date code from the common repository and to build, test, and validate the full master branch.
